short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: When on EDHREC, shows a button to look up cards in Archidekt

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
When on EDHREC, shows a button to look up cards in Archidekt.
Archidekt collections need to be public for this plugin to access cards. 

You can use this plugin to check if you OR one of your friends already has the card you are looking at. 

Small plugin still in development.
